pages.text: $(l)How to use Lloyd$() $(br)$(list2)1. Put water into the upmost slot$() and up to 4 mugs into the lowest slot $(br)$(list2)2. add the right amount of each $(l:brewing/getting_ingredients)Ingredient$() into the four middle slots(the amount can you see in Just Enough Items)$() $(br)$(list2)3. Press the button and wait until the brew process is done$() $(br)$(list2)4. Enjoy your Beer!$().
